title: Task
description: Represents a pending business task that end users need to perform.

assignee.description: The assignee of the task. Either an Employer UUID or 'all'.

title.description: The display title of this task.

description.description: Describes what needs to be done for this task.

timeCreated.description: Creation time of this task. Either a date-time string or a unix epoch.

subjects.description: Objects that represent any additional 'what' or 'whom' that are associated with a given task.
